content: In the distance, you'll see more Revenants and a Bull Guard by an altar, where there are green Wisps to collect. Clear the area and absorb the Wisps, then go back up to where you fought the Father of Stones.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Height of Ember' and the sub-subsection 'Yoaguai Chief - Father of Stones'.
The content is as follows:
In the distance, you'll see more Revenants and a Bull Guard by an altar, where there are green Wisps to collect. Clear the area and absorb the Wisps, then go back up to where you fought the Father of Stones.
